text: Ruth Dreifuss (born 9 January 1940) is a Swiss politician. She was a member of the Swiss Federal Council from (1993-2002), representing the Canton of Geneva. In 1970 she received a Master of Economics from the University of Geneva. She was a member of the Social Democratic Party. == Other websites == * |- |- |- Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of the Swiss Confederation Category:Members of the Federal Council (Switzerland) Category:People from St. Gallen
title: Ruth Dreifuss
